snippet: he latest polling in New Hampshire shows that Scott Brown, the former senator from Massachusetts, would lose to Senator Jeanne Shaheen by 13 percentage points if the election were held today.
abstract: Latest polling in New Hampshire shows that Scott Brown, former Republican senator from Massachusetts, would lose to Sen Jeanne Shaheen by 13 percentage points if the election were held today.
lead_paragraph: he latest polling in New Hampshire shows that Scott Brown, the former senator from Massachusetts, would lose to Senator Jeanne Shaheen by 13 percentage points if the election were held today.

headline.main: New Hampshire: Brown, Not in Race, Behind in Poll
headline.print_headline: New Hampshire: Brown, Not in Race, Behind in Poll
